si.title: බෝල්ඩිමෝර් වරාය ව්යසනයේ ගෝලීය ආර්ථික බලපෑම්
body_lines: මූලික වාර්තාවලට අනුව, නැව පිටත් වී මිනිත්තු කිහිපයක් ඇතුළත එහි විදුලිය අහිමි විය. හදිසි කාර්යක්ෂමතාව ක්රියාත්මක වුවද, නැව ක්රියාත්මක කිරීම සඳහා බල සැපයුම ලබා ගත නොහැක. கட்­டுப்­பாட்டை இழந்த கப்பல் சில நிமி­டங்­களில் பிரான்சிஸ் கீ பாலத்தின் முக்­கிய அடிப்­ப­குதி மீது மோதி­யது. තත්පර කිහිපයක් ඇතුළත පාලම කඩා වැටුණි.

en.title: Global Economic Impacts of Baldimore Harbor Disaster
body_lines: According to initial reports, the ship departed and lost its electricity within a few minutes. Although the emergency efficiency is operated, the power supply is not available to operate the ship. The ship lost control and crashed into the main base of the Francis Key Bridge in a few minutes. Within a few seconds the bridge collapsed.

summary_lines: The Baldimore Harbor disaster led to a ship losing power and crashing into the Francis Key Bridge, causing it to collapse. This incident highlights the critical importance of emergency power systems and the potential for such events to disrupt global economic activities.
